text: Gur Shelef (; born January 10, 1974) is an Israeli former professional basketball player. Standing at 201 cm (6'7")Gur Shelef at euroleague.net he played at the small forward and power forward positions. His father, Ami, and brother, Uri, were also basketball players. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Antwerp Giants players Category:Expatriate basketball people in Belgium Category:Hapoel Galil Elyon players Category:Ironi Ramat Gan players Category:Israeli Basketball Premier League players Category:Israeli men's basketball players Category:Maccabi Tel Aviv B.C. players Category:Small forwards
title: Gur Shelef
